# latest news  about indian stock market

The latest news on the Indian stock market as of June 12, 2025, indicates a significant decline in benchmark indices amid global uncertainties and domestic factors:

The BSE Sensex fell sharply by 823.16 points (1.00%) to close at 81,691.98, and the NSE Nifty dropped 253.20 points (1.01%) to finish at 24,888.20. This decline was broad-based, with all sectoral indices settling in the red, including Nifty Realty, Energy, Consumer Durables, Oil & Gas, Auto, PSU Bank, FMCG, Metal, and Financial Services, each down over 1%1245.


Major Sensex constituents such as Tata Motors, Titan, Eternal, Power Grid, Tata Steel, L&T, and Mahindra & Mahindra were among the top losers, falling over 2% each, while Bajaj Finserv, Asian Paints, and Tech Mahindra were among the few gainers4.


The market was influenced by the weekly expiry of Nifty 50 futures and options contracts and cautious global sentiment due to limited clarity in the partial U.S.-China trade deal, which leaves room for renewed tariff tensions. Additionally, escalating geopolitical tensions in the Middle East and rising oil prices contributed to risk aversion among investors1234.


Analysts noted that consolidation in domestic markets is evolving into a broad-based trend affecting large-cap stocks, with valuation concerns and rising oil prices fueling investor caution. The U.S. is also considering unilateral tariff hikes on key trading partners, adding to uncertainty24.


Despite the sharp fall, technical analysts suggest that the broader trend remains strong and a short-term reversal is possible, though a decisive break below 24,850 on the Nifty could weaken market sentiment further4.


Institutional investors continued their buying streak on the domestic front, while foreign portfolio investors ended their three-day buying spree3.


In the broader market, Nifty Midcap100 and Smallcap100 indices also closed lower by 1.73% and 1.90%, respectively4.


Notably, Eris Lifesciences shares surged 11% during the day, marking a rare bright spot in an otherwise weak market4.

# latest news  in india

Here are the latest major news updates from India as of June 12, 2025:

A tragic Air India plane crash near Ahmedabad has resulted in the death toll rising to 290. Among the passengers was former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani, who died in the crash. A British passenger miraculously survived the disaster. The flight was headed to London from Ahmedabad, and the crash has caused Boeing shares to fall nearly 8%12356.


India and Pakistan continue to experience escalating military tensions, with both countries blaming each other for drone strikes and missile attacks. Recent airstrikes and shelling along the Line of Control have caused casualties on both sides. The conflict is rooted in the longstanding Kashmir dispute4.


In Karnataka, the state cabinet has decided to conduct a new caste survey, scrapping the previous one, which is seen as a setback for Chief Minister Siddaramaiah. The government will consult the Karnataka State Backward Classes Commission for this fresh survey56.


Other notable news includes the opening of India's first international fishery technology expo in Mumbai, a police crackdown on irregularities in classroom construction in Delhi, and ongoing investigations into a Rs 300 crore land scam in Nashik6.

# latest news  in india

The latest major news in India is the tragic crash of an Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner flight AI171, which was en route from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick. The plane crashed shortly after takeoff near Ahmedabad airport in Gujarat, carrying 242 passengers and crew. At least one passenger survived and is hospitalized, while the rest are presumed dead. Among the victims was former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani. The crash marks the first fatal incident involving a Boeing 787 Dreamliner. The airline and Tata Group have announced compensation and support for the families of the victims. The cause appears related to the aircraft struggling to gain lift and engine thrust issues, but investigations are ongoing. The incident has deeply shocked the nation, with Prime Minister Modi expressing condolences12369.

Other notable news includes:

FIR filed against 37 individuals in a Rs 300 crore land scam in Nashik.


Maharashtra hosting Indiaâ€™s first international fishery tech expo.


Karnataka government discarding a caste census report and planning a fresh survey.


Formation of a special police force in Karnataka to tackle communal violence.


Various political developments and preparations for upcoming elections.


Entertainment news such as Aamir Khan confirming a cameo in Rajinikanth's film "Coolie"678.

# latest news  in india

Here are some of the latest major news updates in India as of June 12, 2025:

The Monolithisch India IPO saw 24% subscription in the first hour of its opening day, with a grey market premium (GMP) of 25%1.


India and China are engaged in talks to ensure predictability in the supply chain of rare earth elements, according to the Ministry of External Affairs2.


A tragic Air India plane crash occurred in Ahmedabad, with 265 bodies brought to hospitals and one black box recovered. Investigations suggest possible issues with lack of lift and pilot actions in the cockpit. World leaders have offered condolences following the crash347.


Tensions between India and Pakistan remain high following Operation Sindoor, in which India carried out strikes on terror camps in Pakistan and Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. At least 100 terrorists were reportedly killed. There have been missile and drone attacks along the India-Pakistan border, leading to school closures in Punjab and Jammu & Kashmir, heightened security measures, and blackout orders in some border districts. Indian officials have emphasized measured responses but warned of firm action if further military attacks occur. Diplomatic talks continue, including meetings between India's External Affairs Minister and counterparts from Iran and the EU56.

# latest news  in india

Here are some of the latest major news developments in India as of June 2025:

Air India Plane Crash near Ahmedabad

An Air India flight crashed near Ahmedabad airport recently. The pilots aboard had a combined flying experience of 9,200 hours.


Investigations indicate a lack of lift and possible pilot control issues just before the crash.


One black box has been recovered, and 265 bodies were brought to hospitals following the accident1234.

Operation Sindoor and India-Pakistan Border Tensions

India launched Operation Sindoor, targeting terror infrastructure in Pakistan and Pakistan-occupied Kashmir, reportedly killing at least 100 terrorists.


This led to heightened military tensions with Pakistan, including missile and drone attacks on Indian border areas, which were intercepted by Indian defense systems.


Several Indian states, including Punjab and Jammu & Kashmir, closed schools and universities as a precaution.


India and Pakistan agreed to a full and immediate ceasefire following international diplomatic interventions, including from the US.


Indian officials, including Defence Minister Rajnath Singh and External Affairs Minister S. Jaishankar, emphasized measured responses but warned of firm action if attacked again.


Security was tightened at airports and border posts, with additional paramilitary deployments in Jammu & Kashmir57.

# latest news  in india

The latest major news in India is the tragic crash of an Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner (Flight AI171) shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport en route to London Gatwick. The plane was carrying 242 passengers and crew. At least one passenger survived and is hospitalized, but the crash is considered one of the deadliest involving a Boeing 787, with many fatalities including former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani. The crash occurred in the Meghaninagar area near Ahmedabad, and videos suggest the aircraft struggled to gain lift before descending and exploding in a fireball about 32 seconds after takeoff. The airline and Tata Group have announced compensation and relief flights for families of the victims. The incident has deeply saddened the nation, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressing his condolences and staying in touch with officials12457.

Other ongoing news includes political developments such as preparations for the 2029 Lok Sabha elections with discussions about women's reservation, and various political party strategies and alliances ahead of upcoming polls8. Additionally, there are reports of escalating military tensions between India and Pakistan involving drone strikes and cross-border shelling, resulting in casualties on both sides6.

These are the key current headlines shaping the news landscape in India today.

# latest news  in india

The latest major news in India as of June 12, 2025, includes a tragic Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, resulting in over 200 fatalities. The crash involved a London-bound flight, and police have found one survivor seated at 11A. CCTV footage has captured the fatal 30-second flight from the runway to the crash site. This incident has drawn significant attention nationwide, with prominent figures like former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani among the deceased678.

Another significant recent development was "Operation Sindoor," a military operation conducted by India against terror camps in Pakistan and Pakistan-occupied Kashmir in early May 2025. This operation led to heightened tensions and missile and drone attacks along the India-Pakistan border. India reported neutralizing Pakistan's air defense system in Lahore and killing at least 100 terrorists in the strikes. The Indian government held all-party meetings to brief leaders and build political consensus supporting the operation. Measures such as school closures in Punjab and Jammu & Kashmir, blackout orders in border districts, and increased security at airports and border outposts were implemented amid the escalating conflict. The operation and subsequent tensions prompted international diplomatic activity, including talks between Indian and Iranian foreign ministers and calls from the US for de-escalation12.

For ongoing updates on these and other news, Indian national news sources like The Indian Express, Hindustan Times, NDTV, Times of India, and India Today provide continuous coverage345678.

# latest news  in india

The latest major news in India is the tragic crash of an Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner carrying 242 passengers and crew. The flight AI171 was en route from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick when it crashed shortly after takeoff near Ahmedabad airport in Gujarat. At least one passenger survived and is hospitalized, though initial reports expected no survivors. The crash is notable as it is the first fatal incident involving a Boeing 787 Dreamliner. Rescue and emergency response teams have been mobilized, and relief flights are being arranged for the victims' families. Among the deceased is former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani, who was on the flight heading to London12457.

Additionally, tensions between India and Pakistan remain high, with both countries blaming each other for escalating military confrontations involving missile and drone strikes, resulting in casualties on both sides along the Line of Control in Kashmir6.

Other news highlights include political developments, such as the CPM seeking more seats in alliances for upcoming elections, and various social and governance issues being reported across states78.
